posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: 이것은 테스트 페이지 입니다.이것은 테스트 페이지 입니다. Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new posttest.sh$ hexo new "My New Post" test.pyfrom transformers import BertTokenizertokenizer = BertTokenizer.from_pretrained('bert-base-uncased') More info: Writing Run server$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
